sentence.Network_en: It would be a privilege to partake vicariously of their emotions.
sentence.Network_cn: 以共鸣的方式分享他们的感情也是一种特殊的荣幸.

sentence.Network_en: The ladies only vicariously involved were standing almost at attention as they waited.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些与话题无关而只是代替别人听听的女士们,几乎都在肃立恭听.

sentence.Network_en: By observation of one type and another I gathered experience vicariously.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过种种观察我间接地获得了经验.

PerfectNetExp.abs: vicarious 错位的vicariously 代理地vicarship 牧师的职位
It seems that we are living vicariously(间接感受到地) through our kids no matter what the cost is to them or us.When did we start playing sports.
bout n. 拳击比赛vicariously adv. 可替代地see to it that 保证.
代表性的representative代偿地vicariously代偿性月经manoplaniaxenomenia

list.abs: 替代学习(Vicarious learning)理情行为治疗法(rational emotive behavior therapy) 自我管理方案价值澄清法当前国民小学学校辅导.
vicarious extinction 感应式学习消除vicarious function 替代作用vicarious learning 代替学习
2．替代经验(vicarious experience)：替代经验也是获取学习信心的主要途径之一。当看到朋友们通过不断努力获得成功而非依靠特殊 …
替代责任(Vicarious Liability) ，又称“代负责任”、“代理责任”。指一人依法对与其有特定联系的另一人之行为应无条件承担的间接责任。
ownership中文 ... share price 股票价格 ... vicarious liability 转承债务 virtual ownership 实际上的所有权.

entry.tran: 从他人经验中获得的;间接感受到的
entry.def: A vicarious pleasure or feeling is experienced by watching, listening to, or reading about other people doing something, rather than by doing it yourself.

example.ex: She invents fantasy lives for her own vicarious pleasure...
example.tran: 她幻想过着各种奇妙的生活，从想入非非中获得乐趣。

example.ex: Lots of people use television as their vicarious form of social life.
example.tran: 许多人从电视中间接感受社会生活。

means.word_mean: 1. indirectly, as, by, or through a substitute;
